columns.Customer_ID: The unique identifier for each customer.
columns.Name: The full name of the customer.
columns.Nationality: The country of origin of the customer.
columns.Card_Credit: The credit value associated with the customer's card.
columns.Level_of_Membership: The membership level of the customer.

customer.table_description: The table stores customer details for the restaurant's billing system.

columns.Branch_ID: The unique identifier for each branch.
columns.Manager: The name of the branch manager.
columns.Years_opened: The number of years the branch has been operational.
columns.Location_of_office: The geographical location of the branch office.

branch.table_description: The table stores details of the restaurant's branches.

columns.Customer_ID: The unique identifier for each customer.
columns.Branch_ID: The unique identifier for each branch.
columns.Dish_Name: The name of the ordered dish.
columns.Quantity: The number of dishes ordered by the customer.

customer_order.table_description: The table stores details of customer orders at different branches.
